(4) Axway [https://www.axway.com] Catalysts [https://catalysts.axway.com]

  • Small team of experts in the digital transformation and API space
    • Help customers to make good decisions on their API journey
    • Move the community of API practitioners and their practices forward
  • Team members are distributed globally
    • Emmanuel Methivier: @e_methivier [https://twitter.com/e_methivier]

Scaling API Initiatives Erik Wilde (@dret): API Strategy: From Vision to Value

(10) Getting started is hard, scaling up is even harder



Scaling API Initiatives Erik Wilde (@dret): API Strategy: From Vision to Value

(11) API Programs connect Products and Platforms

  • API products are products with APIs built by individual teams
  • API platforms are tooling and infrastructure for API products
  • API programs optimize API production by managing the API platform


Scaling API Initiatives Erik Wilde (@dret): API Strategy: From Vision to Value

(12) API Program Areas

  • API programs are essential for scaling API initiatives
  • API programs have to cover various areas
    • Strategic Alignment for aligning with other initiatives and activities
    • Organization & Culture so that teams can work effectively
    • Awareness & Adoption so that API usage is maximized
    • Observation for managing program impact and evolution
    • Providing an API Platform for providers and consumers to build on
